title: The White Lama
description: Late 19th century Tibet, after the Grand Lama Mipam dies, Gabriel, the orphan of white explorers, is chosen as his reincarnation. As he is raised by a local family, the seeds of corruption and despair sprout across the land, and it will be up to the "White Lama" to fight his way back to the light. Alexandro Jodorowsky ("The Metabarons," "The Incal") partners with artist Georges Bess ("Son of the Gun") to tell a breath-taking & spiritual epic adventure set at the “Roof of the World.”
author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
